layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x60
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x60
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x44
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 498x18
          text run at (0,0) width 498: "The text below should be centered since text-align does inherit in strict mode."
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,18) size 784x26
        LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 108x26 [border: (1px solid #000000)]
          LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 106x24
            LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 106x20
              LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 102x20 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
                LayoutText {#text} at (33,1) size 36x18
                  text run at (33,1) width 36: "hello."
